creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Barbara Porterfield
description: thin branches with red maple leaves at R extending upward to URQ and down to ULQ; small bird with large beak ad blue crest perched on branch at center; hint of waterfall with dark rocks ULQ; inscription LRQ
markings: R center, oval relief; LRQ, two square intaglios
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Kingfisher and Maple Leaves
